languages.text: "Плоть непостоянна, но металл крепок, как моя преданность".

traits.locale_text: "Плоть непостоянна, но металл крепок, как моя преданность".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Flesh may be fragile, but metal is strong, and so is my devotion."
languages.original_text: "Плоть непостоянна, но металл крепок, как моя преданность".

traits.locale_text: "Flesh may be fragile, but metal is strong, and so is my loyalty."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Flesh may be fragile, but metal is strong, and so is my loyalty."

traits.locale_text: "Flesh may be fragile, but metal is strong, and so is my devotion."

languages.text: “血肉脆弱不堪，但金属强而有力，我的信仰也同样如此。”
languages.original_text: "Flesh may be fragile, but metal is strong, and so is my devotion."

traits.locale_text: “血肉脆弱不堪，但金属强而有力，我的信仰也同样如此。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «La carne es débil, pero el metal es fuerte, al igual que mi devoción».
languages.original_text: "Flesh may be fragile, but metal is strong, and so is my devotion."

traits.locale_text: «La carne es débil, pero el metal es fuerte, al igual que mi devoción».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「肉体はもろいかもしれないが、金属は強靭だ。そして、私の信仰もまた然り」
languages.original_text: "Flesh may be fragile, but metal is strong, and so is my devotion."

traits.locale_text: 「肉体はもろいかもしれないが、金属は強靭だ。そして、私の信仰もまた然り」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Fleisch mag fragil sein, doch Metall ist stark, genau wie meine Hingabe."
languages.original_text: "Flesh may be fragile, but metal is strong, and so is my devotion."

traits.locale_text: "Fleisch mag fragil sein, doch Metall ist stark, genau wie meine Hingabe."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « La chair est fragile, mais le métal, lui, est solide, tout comme ma dévotion. »
languages.original_text: "Flesh may be fragile, but metal is strong, and so is my devotion."

traits.locale_text: « La chair est fragile, mais le métal, lui, est solide, tout comme ma dévotion. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "Flesh may be fragile, but metal is strong, and so is my devotion."

languages.text: "Et kırılganken metal güçlüdür. Tıpkı adanmışlığım gibi."
languages.original_text: "Flesh may be fragile, but metal is strong, and so is my devotion."

traits.locale_text: "Et kırılgan olabilir ama metal güçlüdür. Tıpkı adanmışlığım gibi."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
